department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Parks Canada Commission has a requirement for the purchase of a Subscription Agent service for acquiring, delivery, and management of subscriptions to publications and electronic content hosted by a publisher.
description: The procurement will involve the acquisition of software, database, or other information technology resources, as well as the services of a ",Subscription Agent" for the management of online resources and content.  The service provider will be responsible for managing the online resources and content, including subscriptions to publications and other electronic resources.  The proposed contract period is one year from the contract award date.
tags: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time.
full_summary:
**Tender Announcement 5P301-230119-B: Subscription Agent Services**

**Reference Number:** WS4430727104-Doc4501597800
**Amendment Number:** 1
**Solicitation Number:** WS4430727104
**Publication Date:** March 25, 2024
**Tender Closing Date:** April 9, 2024 at 14:00 EST
**Amendment Date:** April 3, 2024

**Procurement Details:**

* **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Selective Tendering
* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP) against Supply Arrangement
* **Product Category:** Information Retrieval Systems (81111900)

**Contracting Entity and End User:**

* **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)/ Ministère des Travaux publics et des Services gouvernementaux (SPAC)
* **End User Entity:** Parks Canada Agency (PC)

**Proposal Requirements:**

* The successful contractor will provide subscription agent services to Parks Canada Agency (PC) for a period of one year from contract award date.
* The services include:
	+ Acquisition of subscriptions to various publications in all media types (print and electronic)
	+ Delivery, management, and support of said subscriptions
	+ Access to the Electronic Resource Management Platform
* The contract period includes two (2) one-year option periods

**Proposal Submission:**

* Only the following supplier has been invited to submit a proposal:
	+ EBSCO Canada, Ltd.
* The proposal submission deadline is April 9, 2024 at 14:00 EST. Any proposals submitted after this time will be declared non-responsive.

**Contact Information:**
Matthew Curran
matthew.curran@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
